name: The very definition of a beautiful movie
reviewBody: Punch Drunk Love is one of those movie that you keep commenting about it 3 weeks after you watched it, it contains such a beautiful message that even your perspective about life will change. With a brilliant direction, visually astonishing (with and indie look) and a great performance by the hand of Adam Sandler, you will literally fall in love with this movie. The characters are so unique (like every Anderson's character), Sandler character is like a modern Dr. Jekyll and Mr. hide, who portraits his anger in a unique form. This movie explores a lot about human mind, the path to monstrosity and love feelings. A must see! 10/10
